mapper.select: select result.id,result.project_id,result.user_id,result.user_name,projectrole.description as user_role,result.finished_function, result.finished_activity,result.start_time,result.finish_time,result.status,result.create_time as creatTime,result.change_time from (select a.id,a.project_id,a.user_id,a.user_name,a.finished_function,a.finished_activity,a.start_time,a.finish_time,a.status, a.create_time,a.change_time,b.role_id from workhourinfo a left join userprojectrole b on a.user_id = b.user_id where b.project_id = #{projectId} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and DATE(a.start_time) = #{date}) as result,projectrole where result.role_id = projectrole.id
